question: In fourth grade there were 35 students at the start of the year. During the year 10 students left and 10 new students came to school. How many students were in fourth grade at the end?
response:
To find the number of students in fourth grade at the end, we need to add the number of students who left and the number of students who came to school.

35 students at the start of the year + 10 students left during the year = 25 students left at the end of the year
25 students left at the end of the year + 10 new students came to school = 35 students at the end of the year

The answer is 35.
